The aim of mental health care is to help people recover.

It is based on psychosocial rehabilitation techniques.

Recovery includes the development of skills that enable people to learn to live with or cope with the three levels of disability mentioned above.

properties.question: Which of the following is NOT a component of psychosocial rehabilitation techniques in mental health care recovery?
properties.option_a: Development of coping skills for daily living
properties.option_b: Psychoeducation for patients and their families
properties.option_c: Enhancement of physical strength through exercise
properties.option_d: Support in securing employment and social integration
